mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM( SELECT a.pay_id, a.pay_sum, a.pay_date, b.les_id, b.les_nm, b.les_cont FROM pay A, lesson B WHERE a.les_id = b.les_id ORDER BY a.pay_date DESC)a) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page} -1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{page} * #{pageSize}
SELECT a.pay_id, a.pay_sum, a.pay_date, b.les_id, b.les_nm FROM pay A, LESSON b WHERE a.les_id = b.les_id ORDER BY a.pay_date DESC

WITH chart AS ( SELECT z.*, nvl(y.pay_sum,0) pay_sum FROM ( SELECT b.les_id, a.pay_yyyymm FROM ( SELECT '2020' || lpad(level,2,'0') pay_yyyymm FROM dual CONNECT BY level < 13 ) a, ( SELECT * FROM lesson WHERE les_state = 'Y' ) b ) z, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(pay_date,'yyyymm') pay_date, les_id, SUM(pay_sum) AS pay_sum FROM pay GROUP BY TO_CHAR(pay_date,'yyyymm'), les_id ) y WHERE z.les_id = y.les_id (+) AND z.pay_yyyymm = y.pay_date (+) ORDER BY z.les_id ASC, z.pay_yyyymm ASC ) SELECT les_id, LISTAGG(pay_sum, ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY pay_sum ) AS result FROM chart GROUP BY les_id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM( SELECT a.pay_id,a.pay_date,c.tch_nm, b.tch_id, b.les_id, b.les_nm, a.pay_sum FROM pay A, lesson B, teacher C WHERE a.les_id=b.les_id and b.tch_id=c.tch_id ORDER BY a.pay_date DESC)a) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page} -1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{page} * #{pageSize}
SELECT a.pay_id,a.pay_date,c.tch_nm, b.tch_id, b.les_id, b.les_nm, a.pay_sum FROM pay A, lesson B, teacher C WHERE a.les_id=b.les_id and b.tch_id=c.tch_id ORDER BY a.pay_date DESC

WITH chart AS ( SELECT z.*, nvl(y.pay_sum,0) pay_sum from (select les_id, tch_nm, a.pay_yyyymm from (SELECT '2020'|| lpad(level,2,'0') pay_yyyymm FROM dual CONNECT BY level < 13) a, (SELECT * FROM lesson A , teacher b where a.tch_id=b.tch_id )b)z, (SELECT TO_CHAR(pay_date,'yyyymm') pay_date, les_id, SUM(pay_sum) AS pay_sum FROM pay GROUP BY TO_CHAR(pay_date,'yyyymm'), les_id) y WHERE z.les_id = y.les_id (+) AND z.pay_yyyymm = y.pay_date (+) ORDER BY z.les_id ASC, z.pay_yyyymm ASC ) SELECT tch_nm, LISTAGG(pay_sum, ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY pay_sum ) AS result FROM chart GROUP BY tch_nm
select a.les_id, b.les_nm, count(*) cnt from pay a, lesson b where a.les_id=b.les_id and b.les_state = 'Y' group by a. les_id ,b.les_nm order by cnt desc
select count(*) from pay a, lesson b where a.les_id=b.les_id and b.les_state = 'Y'
